channel.title: TeamTorva Trade and ::item problems!
channel.description: hey guys im using teamtorva and im having two main problems that i cant figure out.. 1 nobody on the server can accept trades.. i tried redownloading the source and client but it still wont work for me, like the trade screen comes up for both players and we can both put items into the trade screen but we cant accept the trade at all.. i tried with a new user too and it wouldnt work.. please help

item.title: TeamTorva Trade and ::item problems!
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

hey guys im using teamtorva and im having two main problems that i cant figure out… 1 nobody on the server can accept trades… i tried redownloading the source and client but it still wont work for me, like the trade screen comes up for both players and we can both put items into the trade screen but we cant accept the trade at all… i tried with a new user too and it wouldnt work… please help
